mapper.insert: insert into tbl_order(online_id, product_id, product_num, payment, status, address, remark, customer_id, approver_id, approve_status, approver_remark, user_id, tenant_id, create_time, update_time) values (#{onlineId}, #{productId}, #{productNum}, #{payment}, #{status}, #{address}, #{remark}, #{customerId}, #{approverId}, #{approveStatus}, #{approverRemark}, #{userId}, #{tenantId}, now(), now())
mapper.update: update tbl_order set remark = #{remark}, payment = #{payment}, address = #{address}, product_num = #{productNum}, approver_remark = #{approverRemark}, approve_status = #{approveStatus}, status = #{status}, update_time = now() where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select * from tbl_order where id = #{key} order by id desc
